metadata.title: USN-2440-1 -- Mutt vulnerability
metadata.description: Jakub Wilk discovered that the write_one_header function in mutt did not properly handle newline characters at the beginning of a header. An attacker could specially craft an email to cause mutt to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2440-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  mutt-patched - 1.5.21-6.4ubuntu2.1 mutt - 1.5.21-6.4ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
